Articles.Content:
Hola, estuve investigando sobre los trenes de aterrizaje experimentales y me tope con el tipo oruga. Quise investigar mas pero no hay mucha información. ¿Alguien sabe como es el sistema de freno o sobre su mantenimiento?

Quote

Hi, I was researching experimental landing gears and came across the caterpillar type. I wanted to investigate more but there is not much information. Does anyone know what the brake system is like or about its maintenance?

 

Edited June 8, 2021 by Vanamonde
Please post in English when not using the International subforums.
Howdy. Are you talking about a game mod? Or a real space probe thing?
Hello, I assume you are talking about the expiramental tracked landing gear used on the B-36. It just uses a traditional brake caliper that grips one of the wheels.
